currentDoc: When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you move i

It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

All your life, you had been sad and resentful that you missed the cutoff for the immortality drug. Leah had taken the drug, and you watched from afar as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

All your life, you had been sad and resentful that you missed the cutoff for the immortality drug. Leah had taken the drug, and you watched from afar as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.  
NThe TV in the dining room is talking about drugs. "Someone turn that up!" You bellow.  Damn fools need to turn up their hearing aids. 
"A drug with really bad side effects is in the news today.

It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

 After 57 years of no signs of aging, all 57 years of aging effec seem to be taking effect at once!

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

All your life, you had been sad and resentful that you missed the cutoff for the immortality drug. Leah had taken the drug, and you watched from afar as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

All your life, you had been sad and resentful that you missed the cutoff for the immortality drug. Leah had taken the drug, and you watched from afar as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "Granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.  
NThe TV in the dining room is talking about drugs. "Someone turn that up!" You bellow.  Damn fools need to turn up their hearing aids. 
"APerpetyouth, adrug with rlniinteresting twist s in the news today.," the news caster says. "After 57 years of no signs of aging, all 57 years of aging effects seem to be taking effect at once! People are breaking out in liver spots, thin skin, teeth falling out, and sudden hair loss!"

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to theShe had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the Nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.  
NThe TV in the dining room is talking about drugs. "Someone turn that up!" You bellow.  Damn fools need to turn up their hearing aids. 
"APerpetyouth, adrug with rlniinteresting twist s in the news today.," the news caster says. "After 57 years of no signs of aging, all 57 years of aging effects seem to be taking effect at once! People are breaking out in liver spots, thin skin, teeth falling out, and sudden hair loss!"

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.  
NThe TV in the dining room is talking about drugs. "Someone turn that up!" You bellow.  Damn fools need to turn up their hearing aids. 
"APerpetyouth, adrug with rlniinteresting twist s in the news today.," the news caster says. "After 57 years of no signs of aging, all 57 years of aging effects seem to be taking effect at once! People are breaking out in liver spots, thin skin, teeth falling out, and sudden hair loss!"

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.  
NThe TV in the dining room is talking about drugs. "Someone turn that up!" You bellow.  Damn fools need to turn up their hearing aids. 
"APerpetyouth, adrug with rlniinteresting twist s in the news today.," the news caster says. "After 57 years of no signs of aging, all 57 years of aging effects seem to be taking effect at once! People are breaking out in liver spots, thin skin, teeth falling out, and sudden hair loss!" 

You immediately think of Leah. You rush to the phone and dial her number. "Leah?" You say quickly. "Are you all right". 
There's a whimper at the other end. "John," she says. "I don't know who I am any more." "Stay right there, " You are going

When you're 28, science discovers a drug that stops all effects of aging, creating immortality. Your government decides to give the drug to all citizens under 26, but you and the rest of the “Lost Generations" are deemed too high-risk. When you're 85, the side effects are finally discovered.

Leah had taken the drug, and you watched as she stayed young, gorgeous, and glowing. As you aged, and she stayed the same youthful woman, you slowly drifted apart. She played volleyball on the beach, while you watched, afraid of twisting your game leg. She went with her friends to the club, while you played Spades and took naps after your medications made you drowsy. 

She had come to visit you after your first hip replacement, and she helped you into assisted living. It had cut deep when the nurse on duty had praised your "granddaughter" for helping you adjust. After she left, you wept. "We were lovers, once. " You whispered.  
NThe TV in the dining room is talking about drugs. "Someone turn that up!" You bellow.  Damn fools need to turn up their hearing aids. 
"APerpetyouth, adrug with rlniinteresting twist s in the news today.," the news caster says. "After 57 years of no signs of aging, all 57 years of aging effects seem to be taking effect at once! People are breaking out in liver spots, thin skin, teeth falling out, and sudden hair loss!"
